SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Address
The Address class is a record used to represent the address of a node.
ChangeKeyOperator
The ChangeKeyOperator class is an operator used to change the key of the key-value pair.
CheckpointInfo
The CheckpointInfo class is a record used to store the information about the checkpoint.
CheckPointManager
The CheckPointManager class is used to manage the checkpoints.
Coordinator
The Coordinator class is the main class of the coordinator module.
CoordinatorFileManager
The CoordinatorFileManager class is used to read the operations and configurations from the file.
CreateOperator
This class is responsible for creating the operators from strings.
Data
The Data class is a record used to store the data read from HDFS and the end flag which indicates if there is no more data to read.
EndComputation
The EndComputation class is a message used to notify the end of the computation to the coordinator node.
ErrorMessage
The Error message class is a message used to notify the error to the coordinator node.
FilterOperator
The FilterOperator class is an operator used to filter the key-value pairs.
HadoopCoordinator
The HadoopCoordinator class is responsible for managing the files on HDFS at coordinator-side.
HadoopFileManager
The HadoopFileManager class is an abstract class used to manage the HDFS file system.
HadoopWorker
This class is responsible for reading and writing data from HDFS at worker-side.
KeyAssignmentManager
The KeyAssignmentManager class is responsible for managing the key assignments to workers.
KeyValuePair
The KeyValuePair class is a record used to represent a key-value pair.
MapOperator
The MapOperator class is an operator used to apply a function to the value of the key-value pair.
NormalOperations
The NormalOperations class is a message used to notify the operations to the worker node.
Operation
The Operation class is an abstract class used to notify the operations to the worker node.
Operator
The Operator interface is used to represent the operator.
ProgramExecutor
The ProgramExecutor class is responsible for executing the program.
ProgramPhase
The ProgramPhase enum represents the phase of the program.
ReduceOperation
The ReduceOperation class is a message used to notify the reduce operation to the worker node.
ReduceOperator
The ReduceOperator class is an operator used to reduce the values of the key-value pairs with the same key.
SocketHandler
The SocketHandler class is used to manage the connection with the worker node.
StopComputation
The StopComputation class is a message used to notify the worker node to stop the computation.
Worker
This class is responsible for starting the worker server.
WorkerHandler
The WorkerHandler class is used to handle the communication between the Coordinator and the Worker.
